name: financial-access-initiative
title: Financial Access Initiative
subtitle: An NYU research non-profit website
synopsis:
The Drupal-based website, now replaced, for this *Bill and Melidna Gates* sponsored non-profit allowed contributors to publish blog posts and academic papers. This data was then overlaid with a complex taxonomy called "Big Questions". I also helped set up and implement the site's advanced faceted search powered by Solr.

I worked on the back and frontend extensively for this site while also designing much of the user interface.
